name: Slime Killer (itch)
description:
Goal : A game where your goal is to kill as many slimes as you can within 90s.

Context : This is my first medium sized unity project, I have created a few very small scale projects but this was my first larger one as I just started learning unity and getting into coding about 4 months ago. If you have any tips, comments, or ideas, I'd love to hear them and I hope you like my game!

Instructions : 

WASD to MOVE

P to PAUSE

Left Click to SHOOT
